Again in the ninth<S>8671</S> year<S>8141</S>, in the tenth<S>6224</S> month<S>2320</S>, in the tenth<S>6218</S> day of the month<S>2320</S>, the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, write<S>3789</S> thee the name<S>8034</S> of the day<S>3117</S>, even of this same<S>6106</S> day<S>3117</S>: the king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S> set<S>5564</S> himself against Jerusalem<S>3389</S> this same<S>6106</S> day<S>3117</S>.
And utter<S>4911</S> a parable<S>4912</S> unto the rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto them, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Set on<S>8239</S> a pot<S>5518</S>, set it on<S>8239</S>, and also pour<S>3332</S> water<S>4325</S> into it:
Gather<S>622</S> the pieces<S>5409</S> thereof into it, even every good<S>2896</S> piece<S>5409</S>, the thigh<S>3409</S>, and the shoulder<S>3802</S>; fill<S>4390</S> it with the choice<S>4005</S> bones<S>6106</S>.
Take<S>3947</S> the choice<S>4005</S> of the flock<S>6629</S>, and burn<S>1754</S> also the bones<S>6106</S> under it, and make it boil<S>7570</S> well<S>7571</S>, and let them seethe<S>1310</S> the bones<S>6106</S> of it therein<S>8432</S>. <sup>burn: or, heap</sup>
Wherefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Woe<S>188</S> to the bloody<S>1818</S> city<S>5892</S>, to the pot<S>5518</S> whose scum<S>2457</S> is therein, and whose scum<S>2457</S> is not gone out<S>3318</S> of it! bring it out<S>3318</S> piece<S>5409</S> by piece<S>5409</S>; let no lot<S>1486</S> fall<S>5307</S> upon it.
For her blood<S>1818</S> is in the midst<S>8432</S> of her; she set<S>7760</S> it upon the top<S>6706</S> of a rock<S>5553</S>; she poured<S>8210</S> it not upon the ground<S>776</S>, to cover<S>3680</S> it with dust<S>6083</S>;
That it might cause fury<S>2534</S> to come up<S>5927</S> to take<S>5358</S> vengeance<S>5359</S>; I have set<S>5414</S> her blood<S>1818</S> upon the top<S>6706</S> of a rock<S>5553</S>, that it should not be covered<S>3680</S>.
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Woe<S>188</S> to the bloody<S>1818</S> city<S>5892</S>! I will even make the pile<S>4071</S> for fire great<S>1431</S>.
Heap<S>7235</S> on wood<S>6086</S>, kindle<S>1814</S> the fire<S>784</S>, consume<S>8552</S> the flesh<S>1320</S>, and spice<S>7543</S> it well<S>4841</S>, and let the bones<S>6106</S> be burned<S>2787</S>.
Then set<S>5975</S> it empty<S>7386</S> upon the coals<S>1513</S> thereof, that the brass<S>5178</S> of it may be hot<S>3179</S>, and may burn<S>2787</S>, and that the filthiness<S>2932</S> of it may be molten<S>5413</S> in it<S>8432</S>, that the scum<S>2457</S> of it may be consumed<S>8552</S>.
She hath wearied<S>3811</S> herself with lies<S>8383</S>, and her great<S>7227</S> scum<S>2457</S> went not forth<S>3318</S> out of her: her scum<S>2457</S> shall be in the fire<S>784</S>.
In thy filthiness<S>2932</S> is lewdness<S>2154</S>: because I have purged<S>2891</S> thee, and thou wast not purged<S>2891</S>, thou shalt not be purged<S>2891</S> from thy filthiness<S>2932</S> any more, till I have caused my fury<S>2534</S> to rest<S>5117</S> upon thee.
I the LORD<S>3068</S> have spoken<S>1696</S> it: it shall come to pass<S>935</S>, and I will do<S>6213</S> it; I will not go back<S>6544</S>, neither will I spare<S>2347</S>, neither will I repent<S>5162</S>; according to thy ways<S>1870</S>, and according to thy doings<S>5949</S>, shall they judge<S>8199</S> thee, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
Also the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, behold, I take away<S>3947</S> from thee the desire<S>4261</S> of thine eyes<S>5869</S> with a stroke<S>4046</S>: yet neither shalt thou mourn<S>5594</S> nor weep<S>1058</S>, neither shall thy tears<S>1832</S> run down<S>935</S>. <sup>run down: Heb. go</sup>
Forbear<S>1826</S> to cry<S>602</S>, make<S>6213</S> no mourning<S>60</S> for the dead<S>4191</S>, bind<S>2280</S> the tire of thine head<S>6287</S> upon thee, and put on<S>7760</S> thy shoes<S>5275</S> upon thy feet<S>7272</S>, and cover<S>5844</S> not thy lips<S>8222</S>, and eat<S>398</S> not the bread<S>3899</S> of men<S>582</S>. <sup>Forbear: Heb. Be silent</sup> <sup>lips: Heb. upper lip</sup>
So I spake<S>1696</S> unto the people<S>5971</S> in the morning<S>1242</S>: and at even<S>6153</S> my wife<S>802</S> died<S>4191</S>; and I did<S>6213</S> in the morning<S>1242</S> as I was commanded<S>6680</S>.
And the people<S>5971</S> said<S>559</S> unto me, Wilt thou not tell<S>5046</S> us what these things are to us, that thou doest<S>6213</S> so?
Then I answered<S>559</S> them, The word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Speak<S>559</S> unto the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Behold, I will profane<S>2490</S> my sanctuary<S>4720</S>, the excellency<S>1347</S> of your strength<S>5797</S>, the desire<S>4261</S> of your eyes<S>5869</S>, and that which your soul<S>5315</S> pitieth<S>4263</S>; and your sons<S>1121</S> and your daughters<S>1323</S> whom ye have left<S>5800</S> shall fall<S>5307</S> by the sword<S>2719</S>. <sup>that: Heb. the pity of your soul</sup>
And ye shall do<S>6213</S> as I have done<S>6213</S>: ye shall not cover<S>5844</S> your lips<S>8222</S>, nor eat<S>398</S> the bread<S>3899</S> of men<S>582</S>.
And your tires<S>6287</S> shall be upon your heads<S>7218</S>, and your shoes<S>5275</S> upon your feet<S>7272</S>: ye shall not mourn<S>5594</S> nor weep<S>1058</S>; but ye shall pine away<S>4743</S> for your iniquities<S>5771</S>, and mourn<S>5098</S> one<S>376</S> toward another<S>251</S>.
Thus Ezekiel<S>3168</S> is unto you a sign<S>4159</S>: according to all that he hath done<S>6213</S> shall ye do<S>6213</S>: and when this cometh<S>935</S>, ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
Also, thou son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, shall it not be in the day<S>3117</S> when I take<S>3947</S> from them their strength<S>4581</S>, the joy<S>4885</S> of their glory<S>8597</S>, the desire<S>4261</S> of their eyes<S>5869</S>, and that whereupon they set<S>4853</S> their minds<S>5315</S>, their sons<S>1121</S> and their daughters<S>1323</S>, <sup>that: Heb. the lifting up of their soul</sup>
That he that escapeth<S>6412</S> in that day<S>3117</S> shall come<S>935</S> unto thee, to cause thee to hear<S>2045</S> it with thine ears<S>241</S>?
In that day<S>3117</S> shall thy mouth<S>6310</S> be opened<S>6605</S> to him which is escaped<S>6412</S>, and thou shalt speak<S>1696</S>, and be no more dumb<S>481</S>: and thou shalt be a sign<S>4159</S> unto them; and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
